00040 using namespace TREX::europa;

00043  * class TREX::europa::Synchronizer

00046 // structors 
00047 
00048 Synchronizer::Synchronizer(Assembly &assembly)
00049  :m_assembly(assembly) {}
00050 
00051 Synchronizer::~Synchronizer() {}
00052 
00053 
00054 // observers
00055 
00056 bool Synchronizer::overlaps_now(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok) const {
00057   EUROPA::eint now(m_assembly.currentTick()); 
00058   
00059   return tok->start()->lastDomain().getUpperBound()<=now 
00060       && tok->end()->lastDomain().getLowerBound()>=now;
00061 }
00062 
00063 bool Synchronizer::accept(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok) const {
00064   return overlaps_now(tok);
00065 }
00066 
00067 // manipulators
00068 
00069 bool Synchronizer::synchronize(bool first) {
00070   if( first ) {
00071     m_steps = 0;
00072     m_obs_included = false;
00073   }
00074   if( !m_obs_included ) {
00075     if( !update_externals() )
00076       return false;
00077     m_obs_included = true;
00078   }
00079   return resolve() && update_internals();
00080 }
00081 
00082 
00083 void Synchronizer::set_internal(EUROPA::ObjectId obj) {
00084   m_internal_obs.insert(std::make_pair(obj, EUROPA::TokenId::noId()));
00085 }
00086 
00087 void Synchronizer::notify(EUROPA::ObjectId const &obj,
00088                           EUROPA::TokenId const &obs) {
00089   obs_map::iterator pos;
00090   bool inserted;
00091   
00092   boost::tie(pos, inserted) = m_external_obs.insert(std::make_pair(obj, obs));
00093   if( !inserted ) {
00094     EUROPA::TokenId former = pos->second;
00095     pos->second = obs;
00096 
00097     former->end()->restrictBaseDomain(obs->start()->baseDomain());
00098     m_assembly.completed(former);
00099   }
00100 }
00101 
00102 bool Synchronizer::update_externals() {
00103   EUROPA::eint next = m_assembly.currentTick()+1;
00104   
00105   for(obs_map::iterator t=m_external_obs.begin(); m_external_obs.end()!=t; ++t) {
00106     t->second->end()->restrictBaseDomain(EUROPA::IntervalDomain(next,
00107                                                                 std::numeric_limits<EUROPA::eint>::infinity()));
00108     EUROPA::eint min_dur = next - t->second->start()->baseDomain().getUpperBound();
00109     
00110     debugMsg("trex:sync", "Extending duration of "<<t->second->toString()<<" to ["<<min_dur<<", +inf).");
00111     t->second->duration()->restrictBaseDomain(EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain(min_dur,
00112                                                                         std::numeric_limits<EUROPA::eint>::infinity()));
00113                                                                         
00114     if( !m_assembly.propagate() ) {
00115       m_assembly.log("sync")<<"Failed to extend duration of last observation "
00116                             <<t->first->getName().toString()<<'.'<<t->second->getUnqualifiedPredicateName().toString();
00117       return false;
00118     }
00119     if( t->second->canBeCommitted() )
00120       t->second->commit();
00121   }
00122   return true;
00123 }
00124 
00125 bool Synchronizer::update_internals() {
00126   if( m_assembly.invalid() )
00127     return false;  
00128   for(obs_map::const_iterator i=m_internal_obs.begin(); m_internal_obs.end()!=i; ++i) {
00129     if( check_state(i->first, i->second) )
00130   }
00131   return resolve();
00132 }
00133 
00134 
00135 bool Synchronizer::resolve() {  
00136   size_t last_count;
00137   do {
00138     last_count = m_steps;
00139     if( !m_assembly.propagate() ) 
00140       return false;
00141     if( !m_assembly.process_agenda(*this) )
00142       return false;
00143   } while( last_count!=m_steps );
00144   
00145   return true;
00146 }
00147 
00148 
00149 bool Synchronizer::resolve(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok) {
00150   EUROPA::TokenId candidate;
00151   if( m_assembly.is_unit(tok, candidate) ) {
00152     ++m_steps;
00153     bool result = m_assembly.merge_token(tok, candidate)
00154               || m_assembly.insert_token(tok, m_steps);
00155     if( result && m_assembly.isInternal(tok) ) {
00156       EUROPA::TokenId active = tok;
00157       if( tok->isMerged() )
00158         active = tok->getActiveToken();
00159       std::cout<<"resolved internal into "<<active->toLongString()<<std::endl;
00160     }
00161     return result;
00162   }
00163   return true;
00164 }
